title: Diary of an Overland Journey from Bombay to England, and of a year's residence in Great Britain
author: Khurshed-ji, ARDSHER
snippet: Near thecitadel stood the Victualling Office, an extensive range of buildings, in whichwere two bakehouses, each containing four ovens, that in one day baked asufficient quantity of bread for 16,000 men; this establishment is nowremoved to Stonehouse, west of the town, where noble buildings have beenerected for the purpose.
